title: :broom:   Deleting a picture
description:
You can permanently delete a picture from the album if it is already in the trash.
​

fields.name: Deleting a picture from the album
fields.value:
First, click on the **delete button (:broom:)** of the message of the picture you want to delete.
Then confirm the action by clicking on the **:broom: button** in the confirmation message.
